name: Employee Satisfaction Survey
description: We invite you to participate in our Employee Satisfaction Survey. The goal is to assess your satisfaction with salary, company culture, your job role, and interactions with colleagues. Your honest feedback is crucial for us to improve our workplace and create a better environment for everyone. Please take a moment to reflect on these areas and provide your thoughtful responses. Thank you for your time and input.
questions: How satisfied are you with your current salary and benefits package?
How satisfied are you with the company culture?
How satisfied are you with your job role and responsibilities?
How satisfied are you with the level of collaboration and support with your colleagues?

description: To evaluate the effectiveness of remote work policies.

description: To measure the effectiveness of team collaboration.
questions: How well do you collaborate with your team?

description: To assess the wellness and health of employees.
questions: How would you rate your overall health?
Do you feel the company supports your wellness?
What wellness programs would you like to see?

name: Technology Usage Survey
description: To understand the usage and satisfaction with company technology.
questions: How satisfied are you with the technology provided by the company?
What additional technology do you need?
Do you face any issues with current technology?

description: To assess the career development opportunities within the company.
questions: How satisfied are you with your career development?
What career development programs would you like to see?

name: Productivity Survey
description: To measure productivity levels across departments.
questions: How would you rate your productivity?
What factors affect your productivity?
How can we improve your productivity?

description: To gather feedback on innovation within the company.
questions: How satisfied are you with the level of innovation?

Do you feel supported in your innovative efforts?
How can we foster more innovation?

description: To assess the effectiveness of customer service practices.
questions: How would you rate our customer service?
